lead_paragraph: The man, 17, was in critical condition on Friday night, the police said, and no physical description of a suspect was available.

headline.print_headline: Teenager in Harlem Is Shot in the Head
headline.main: Teenager Shot in Head Outside Harlem Housing Project, Police Say

snippet: The man, 17, was in critical condition on Friday night, the police said, and no physical description of a suspect was available.
abstract: Harlem teenager, whose identity is not released, remains in critical condition after he was shot in head outside housing project.
